articles.title: Mexico cartel turns in own men over US kidnappings - BBC
articles.description: A splinter group of the Gulf Cartel also reportedly apologised for the kidnapping of four Americans.
articles.content: Reports from the Mexican border city of Matamoros say a splinter group of the Gulf Cartel, called the Scorpions Group, has apologised for kidnapping four US citizens last week, killing two of them, a… [+3639 chars]

articles.author: CNBC
articles.title: Gulf cartel apologizes after Americans are kidnapped and killed in Mexico - CNBC
